issue.title: [C++] Build dependencies for Parquet library without arrow support
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-820](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-820). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Parquet C++ library without Arrow depends only on a subset of Arrow components(buffers, io). The scope of this JIRA is to build libarrow with minimal dependencies for users of Parquet C++ library without Arrow support.
